page.title: 11The Crown Inn, Middleton.
page.content: The Crown stands beside the A47 road in the centre of Middleton.It is basically a village inn but it does have a substantial passing trade.The landlady told us that most of the regular customers live in Middleton and that they account for about 80% of the business in Winter and about 60% in Summer. { Meals}form a very important part of the business. Gammon is the most popular dish in Winter and Ploughmans Lunches are the most popular in the Summer. Sunday lunches are popular. {Beer}is still the most popular drink. Several clubs in the village meet regularly at the crown which provides a useful focal point for entertainment in the village. There is another inn at Fair Green but North Runcton has no public house.
